Room.Name: Rosecrest Street/Regalia Drive Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the intersection of Rosecrest Street and Regalia Drive.
Room.LongDescription: Regalia Drive runs east to the Memorial Fountain, and eventually ends at the Regalia Convent. The convent is one of the few remaining institutions just for women. Rosecrest continues to the north and south, parallel to the City Wall on the west. Guards patrol the top of the wall in a regular pattern.
